title: After sale, money equal to real property exemption protected
context: ยง651-96 After sale, money equal to real property exemption protected. The money paid to the defendant as the defendant&rsquo;s exemption shall be entitled, for the period of six months thereafter, to the same protection against attachment and execution which section 651-92 gives to the real property. If the defendant, within such six-month period, applies such proceeds to the purchase of real property, the date of such acquisition and commencement of residence for the purpose of section 651-92(b)(5), shall be considered to be the date of the acquisition of interest in and commencement of residence on the real property whose sale resulted in such proceeds. [L 1976, c 136, pt of ยง1; am L 1978, c 46, ยง10; gen ch 1985]
